00000

2.
a. 1110110001000000
b. 0000001011011011
c. 1100010010110110
d. 1101100010000000
e. 1111111101101101

3.
a. 20
 Sign-Magnitude: 00010100
Twos-Complement: 00010100
-20
 Sign-Magnitude: 10010100
Twos-Complement: 11101100
b. -71
 Sign-Magnitude: 11000111
Twos-Complement: 10111001
71
 Sign-Magnitude: 01000111
Twos-Complement: 01000111
c. -68
 Sign-Magnitude: 10001010
Twos-Complement: 11110110
68
 Sign-Magnitude: 00001010
Twos-Complement: 00001010
d. 91
 Sign-Magnitude: 01011011
Twos-Complement: 01011011
-91
 Sign-Magnitude: 11011011
Twos-Complement: 10100101
e. 114
 Sign-Magnitude: 01110010
Twos-Complement: 01110010
-114
 Sign-Magnitude: 11110010
Twos-Complement: 10001110

4.
a. Addition
   0111010101000100
+  0000000000100000
=  0111010101100100 (No Overflow)
Subtraction
   0111010101000100
-  0000000000100000
=  0111010101000100
+  1111111111100000
=  0111010100100100 (No Overflow)
b. Addition
   1111010110010000
+  0000001011100100
=  1111100001110100 (No Overflow)
Subtraction
   1111010110010000
-  0000001011100100
=  1111010110010000
+  1111110100011100
= 11111001010101100 (No Overflow)
